name: THERONE
description:
Get ready for an adventure along with Nick, the mage, who will have to venture into a new kingdom.

Welcome adventurer. In this classic RPG, you will have only one mission, finding the forbidden magic.

You will have to travel to an unknown kingdom, meet new friends and fight to survive...

Can Nick accomplish this mission?  

Features:

  • Classic Turn-based RPG.
  • Unique Pixel Art and Soundtrack.
  • Explore the new kingdom and meet friends!
  • Maybe an interesting story…?
  • Dungeons with puzzles.

Controls:

Arrow keys  
Z, Enter
X
P

Follow me if you wish to know more about the game:
Twitter: Alekstain

Any bugs, please report in the comment section.
